data.title: Dick Lundy Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Dick Lundy on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Dick Lundy including Donald's Tire Trouble, Sea Scouts, and more.
data.text: Richard James Lundy was an American animator and film director who worked at several animation studios including The Walt Disney Company, MGM, and Hanna-Barbera. Lundy was a pioneer of personality animation and is best remembered as one of the creators of Donald Duck. Throughout his career he worked as a primary animator on at least 60 films, both short and feature-length, and directed 51 shorts.
